mdRecord.dcterms:title: Surgical stitching instrument
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Singer Sewing Machine Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Singer Surgical Stitching Instrument, World Wide Service, Model A-3, Made in U.S.A. Instrument in leather case; kit also includes thread wheels, wire brush, attachment tool, and curved needles of varying sizes. Leather case contained in cardboard box. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
